mapper.select: select r.clientMessageId,b.roomID,r.roomNo,b.endtime,c.clientname,b.assessment,b.payproject from bill b,room r,clientmessage c,meter m where b.roomID=r.roomID and r.clientMessageId=c.clientMessageId and b.roomID=m.homeNO and b.assessment!=0 and m.auditStatus=1 and r.roomNo like concat('%',concat(#{roomNo},'%'))
mapper.update: update bill set assessment=0 where roomID=#{roomID} and payproject=#{payproject}
mapper.insert: INSERT into feecontent(clientMessageId,assessment,paymentType,collectDate,tollgatherer)VALUES( (select clientMessageId from clientmessage where clientname=#{clientname}),#{assessment},'微信','2019-11-21','系统123')
